alert.note: Alert for Noble (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 18 at 1:50AM EDT by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall will continue on the West Fork Duck Creek. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Noble. * WHEN...Until 1000 AM EDT Saturday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 150 AM EDT, gauge reports indicated water levels remain above flood stage on the West Fork Duck Creek. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Dudley, Dexter City and Harriettsville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
